How many people are affected by hand-foot-genital syndrome ?,Hand-foot-genital syndrome is very rare; only a few families with the condition have been reported worldwide.,GHR,hand-foot-genital syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to hand-foot-genital syndrome ?,"Mutations in the HOXA13 gene cause hand-foot-genital syndrome. The HOXA13 gene provides instruc
